name: Eco Pop! Island
description:
Welcome to Eco Island!
For as long as living memory Eco Island has been paradise, but now a new threat must be defeated. Pop the toxic pollution bubbles to restore the environment and save the island!

This is a casual arcade style bubble-popping 2d shooter.

Gameplay based on early 2000's  classic web game Bubble Struggle (Trouble), which is itself based on a 1990's coin op arcade game called SuperPang!

Instructions:
Mouse and click to navigate menus
Left and right arrow keys to run 
Up shoots a projectile
As hunter, press and hold up for 1 sec to place a trap or pick one up if you are standing near it.
Down arrow switches between characters

Current Features:
60 Levels of varying difficulty

3 Unique characters with their own projectiles
    Rose: Shoot a thorny, upwardly growing vine
    Hunter: Place laser traps and shoot them from afar
    Spike: Shoot a large boulder with a wide hitbox

4 "Zones" each of which features a bubble color that behaves in its own way
    Zone 1: Jungle || Cores bounce in a classic, parabolic way
    Zone 2: Forest || Cores jump about like grasshoppers!
    Zone 3: Plains: || Cores fly fast horizontally
    Zone 4: Falls || Cores have no gravity

Upgrade your character's speed and projectiles by collecting bubble cores

On first release this is a v0.1.0 free prototype version of the game.

Known Bugs

On occasion, fast moving projectiles will cause a bubble to bounce off instead of pop.

Spamming the "Shoot" button as Hunter will cause traps to behave strangely

Pink and Purple bubbles will often initially "slide" on sloped walls in the "falls" zone instead of bouncing.
